official_title: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring), that when the House adjourns on Thursday, August 22, 1974, it stand adjourned until 12 o'clock noon on Wednesday, September 11, 1974, or until 12 o'clock noon on the second day after its Members are notified to reassemble in accordance with section 2 of this resolution, whichever event first occurs.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides for the conditional adjournment of the two Houses of Congress over the Labor Day Holiday.

titles.title: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring), that when the House adjourns on Thursday, August 22, 1974, it stand adjourned until 12 o'clock noon on Wednesday, September 11, 1974, or until 12 o'clock noon on the second day after its Members are notified to reassemble in accordance with section 2 of this resolution, whichever event first occurs.
